nodes.text: Assault Team One, along with Assault Team Two, was ordered, by Force Commander Thrawn of the Chiss Expansionary Defense Force, to perform an out-hull operation on a Vagaari gravity projector's starboard side during the Battle of the Geroon homeworld. They then located and neutralized the crew aboard the projector with minimal damage to the projector itself. After that they assisted Chief Engineer Yal'avi'kema in collapsing the projector.
